features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User registration and login with NextAuth.js, role-based access control (USER/ADMIN), password hashing with bcryptjs

features.name: Public Landing Page
features.description: Homepage with hero section, product showcase, how it works, benefits, and FAQ sections

features.name: Product Management
features.description: Product listing with category filtering, product detail pages with plans and demo credentials

features.name: Pricing System
features.description: Pricing page with plan comparison table showing monthly/yearly/lifetime plans

features.name: Trial System
features.description: 7-day free trial system with trial creation, expiration tracking, and conversion to subscription

features.name: Subscription Management
features.description: Subscription creation, cancellation, status tracking, and billing history

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: PayTR payment gateway integration with payment initiation, callback handling, and payment page

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: User dashboard with overview stats, active trials, subscriptions, and billing information

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Admin dashboard with user management, product management, trial tracking, subscription management, and payment history

features.name: Navigation Components
features.description: Main navigation bar and footer with responsive design and authentication state handling

features.name: WhatsApp Support
features.description: Floating WhatsApp button component available on all pages with dynamic message generation

features.name: Database Models
features.description: Prisma schema with User, Product, Plan, Trial, Subscription, and Payment models with relationships

features.name: Database Utilities
features.description: Prisma client configuration and database seeding script

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions for currency formatting, date formatting, and remaining days calculation

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for NextAuth session and JWT
